fallback.translation[0].definitions[0].d: something that can be used or done if a supply, method etc fails

fallback.translation[1].definitions[1].d: something that can be done if the original plan does not succeed, or that can be used if the thing that you want is not available

Fallbacks are essential to ensure you are not putting your home at risk if your saving plans go wrong.
